description: Completed a Master of Information Technology at UNSW, specializing in Data Science, with a Distinction (D) average. The program provided deep insights into advanced software development, artificial intelligence, and data science. It combined rigorous academic theory with extensive hands-on projects, equipping me with practical skills in cutting-edge technologies and preparing me to excel in complex, data-driven environments across various industries.

Completed a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering at Chongqing University of Technology, focusing on IT-related courses like programming, data structures, databases, and networking. Developed a solid foundation in both electrical and computing disciplines. Participated in interdisciplinary projects, honing practical skills. Achieved a High Distinction (HD) average, reflecting excellence in both academic and practical work.
